title: Account Executive A - Canada - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Identifies opportunities in the marketplace to place our casual footwear through multiple channels of distribution. Creates a service distinction with our retail partners through detailed account planning and a thorough understanding of our customerÂ’s business.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
